column6: "DAY OF THE ATOM" PART 2 (OF 4) Last issue's surprise ending should have X-fans talking for months! Will the return of this character prove to be the saving grace of the X-Men, or will it doom them forever? Plus: a surprise twist in the life of Gambit!
column8: | writer:Chuck Austen | writer:Stan Lee | colorist:Udon Comics | penciller (cover):Salvador Larroca | inker:Danny K. Miki
